```{r}
string_vec = c("my", "name", "is", "jeff")

str_detect(string_vec, "jeff")
str_replace(string_vec, "jeff", "Jeff")
```

```{r}
string_vec = c(
  "i think we all rule for participating",
  "i think i have been caught",
  "i think this will be quite fun actually",
  "it will be fun, i think"
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "^i think") #start with "i think"
str_detect(string_vec, "i think$") #ends with "i think"
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  "Y'all remember Pres. HW Bush?",
  "I saw a green bush",
  "BBQ and Bushwalking at Molonglo Gorge",
  "BUSH -- LIVE IN CONCERT!!"

str_detect(string_vec,"[Bb]ush") # detect both B and b in this pattern
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  '7th inning stretch',
  '1st half soon to begin. Texas won the toss.',
  'she is 5 feet 4 inches tall',
  '3AM - cant sleep :('
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "^[0-9][a-zA-Z]") # first a number and a letter next.
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  'Its 7:11 in the evening',
  'want to go to 7-11?',
  'my flight is AA711',
  'NetBios: scanning ip 203.167.114.66'
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "7\\.11") # "." means anything, use \\ to mean specific "\\."
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  'The CI is [2, 5]',
  ':-]',
  ':-[',

  )

str_detect(string_vec, "\\[")
```

## NSDUH --- strings

```{r}
nsduh_url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"

table_marj = 
  read_html(nsduh_url) %>% 
  html_nodes(css = "table") %>% 
  first() %>%
  html_table() %>%
  slice(-1) %>%
  as_tibble()
```


```{r}
data_marj = 
  table_marj %>%
  select(-contains("P Value")) %>% # get rid of some undisireble cols.
  pivot_longer(
    -State,
    names_to = "age_year", 
    values_to = "percent") %>%
  separate(age_year, into = c("age", "year"), sep = "\\(") %>% # seperate "12+(2013-2014)" in to two cols.
  mutate(
    year = str_replace(year, "\\)", ""),
    percent = str_replace(percent, "[a-c]$", ""), # remove letter at the end
    percent = as.numeric(percent)) %>%
  filter(!(State %in% c("Total U.S.", "Northeast", "Midwest", "South", "West"))) # don't want the state variable to be either "Total U.S.", "Northeast", "Midwest", "South", "West".
```

# NSDUH --- factors

```{r}
data_marj %>%
  filter(age == "12-17") %>% 
  mutate(State = fct_reorder(State, percent)) %>% # fct_reorder according to percent
  # mutate(State = fct_relevel(State, "Texas")), make it a factor, and put texas first
  ggplot(aes(x = State, y = percent, color = year)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) %>% 
```

## weather dataset

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USC00519397", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2017-01-01",
    date_max = "2017-12-31") %>%
  mutate(
    name = recode(
      id, 
      USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY", 
      USC00519397 = "Waikiki_HA",
      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) %>%
  select(name, id, everything())
```

```{r}
weather_df %>%
  mutate(name = forcats::fct_relevel(name, c("Waikiki_HA", "CentralPark_NY", "Waterhole_WA"))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill = name), color = "blue", alpha = .5) + 
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

```{r}
weather_df %>%
  mutate(name = forcats::fct_reorder(name, tmax)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill = name), color = "blue", alpha = .5) + 
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```


```{r}
weather_df %>%
  lm(tmax ~ name, data = .) # outcome, predictor, data is weather_df

weather_df %>%
  mutate(name = forcats::fct_relevel(name, c("Waikiki_HA", "CentralPark_NY", "Waterhole_WA"))) %>% 
  lm(tmax ~ name, data = .)
```
